entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 p.m. CST Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 11.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 2:00 AM CST Friday 12 May 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 11.1°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 51 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 11 May 2023
